message: Let's split it 50/50, fair and square!
I'll give you 400k, it's a good starting point. Let's see if you can do better next round.
I'll take a bit more, but still willing to compromise!
You're getting greedy, I'll give you a bit more. But I'm not giving away the farm!
I'm not backing down, but I'm willing to meet you halfway!
You're not budging, neither am I. I'll meet you at the middle, but I'm not going to give up my advantage.
